---
title: JWP Goals
---

Back when Southampton F.C. were in the Premier League, a player named James Ward-Prowse (JWP) was (and still is) a club legend and a very talented football player.

The map below shows all his goals, whom he scored against and where he scored them from in that last season he played for the club.

![JWP Goal Map 22/23 season](images/jwp_goal_map_2223.png)

The code used to extract and plot the data can be found in the folder "JWP_goals".
